title: The Prospector Recipe
full_text:
The Prospector Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
cognac
1/2
ounce
white
creme de cacao
1/2
ounce
green chartreuse
1/2
ounce
cointreau
large strip of
lemon zest
, for garnish
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Twist lemon zest over drink and use as garnish.
Special equipment
Mixing glass, bar spoon, strainer
